name: High-cost PPIs
title: Prescribing of high-cost PPIs
as a percentage of prescribing of all PPIs
description: as a percentage of prescribing of all PPIs.
See the full list of BNF codes used in this measure.
why_it_matters: Proton-pump inhibitors (PPIs) have been generic for several years, and the generic is significantly cheaper than the branded product.
Therefore the vast majority of patients can be prescribed the generic
numerator_where:
bnf_code IN ( 
'0103050E0BBAAAA', --Nexium_Tab 20mg 
'0103050E0BBABAB', --Nexium_Tab 40mg 
'0103050E0BBAEAA', --Nexium_Tab 20mg (Arrow Generics Ltd) 
'0103050E0BBAFAB', --Nexium_Tab 40mg (Arrow Generics Ltd) 
'0103050E0BBAGAA', --Nexium Control_Tab 20mg 
'0103050L0BBAAAA', --Zoton_Cap 30mg (E/C Gran) 
'0103050P0AAAMAM', --Omeprazole_Tab Disper 10mg (E/C Pellets) 
'0103050P0AAANAN', --Omeprazole_Tab Disper 20mg (E/C Pellets) 
'0103050P0AAAPAP', --Omeprazole_Tab Disper 40mg (E/C Pellets) 
'0103050P0AABCBC', --Omeprazole_Tab E/C 10mg 
'0103050P0AABDBD', --Omeprazole_Tab E/C 20mg 
'0103050P0AABEBE', --Omeprazole_Tab E/C 40mg 
'0103050P0BBAAAA', --Losec_Cap E/C 20mg 
'0103050P0BBABAE', --Losec_Cap E/C 40mg 
'0103050P0BBACAF', --Losec_Cap E/C 10mg 
'0103050P0BBADAM', --Losec MUPS_Tab Disper 10mg (E/C Pellets) 
'0103050P0BBAEAN', --Losec MUPS_Tab Disper 20mg (E/C Pellets) 
'0103050P0BBAFAP', --Losec MUPS_Tab Disper 40mg (E/C Pellets) 
'0103050P0BDABBD', --Omeran_Tab G/R 20mg 
'0103050P0BEAABC', --Zanprol_Tab G/R 10mg 
'0103050P0BGAAAM', --Mezzopram_Tab Disper G/R 10mg 
'0103050P0BGABAN', --Mezzopram_Tab Disper G/R 20mg 
'0103050P0BGACAP', --Mezzopram_Tab Disper G/R 40mg 
'0103050R0BBAAAA', --Protium_Tab E/C 40mg 
'0103050R0BBABAB', --Protium_Tab E/C 20mg 
'0103050R0BCAAAB', --Pantoloc Control_Tab E/C 20mg 
'0103050T0BBAAAA', --Pariet_Tab E/C 10mg 
'0103050T0BBABAB') --Pariet_Tab E/C 20mg
denominator_where:
bnf_code LIKE '0103050E0%AA' OR --Esomeprazole_Tab E/C 20mg (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0103050E0%AB' OR --Esomeprazole_Tab E/C 40mg (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0103050E0%AF' OR --Esomeprazole_Cap E/C 20mg (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0103050E0%AG' OR --Esomeprazole_Cap E/C 40mg (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0103050L0%AA' OR --Lansoprazole_Cap 30mg (E/C Gran) (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0103050L0%AB' OR --Lansoprazole_Cap 15mg (E/C Gran) (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0103050L0%AG' OR --Lansoprazole_Orodisper Tab 15mg (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0103050L0%AH' OR --Lansoprazole_Orodisper Tab 30mg (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0103050P0%AA' OR --Omeprazole_Cap E/C 20mg (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0103050P0%AE' OR --Omeprazole_Cap E/C 40mg (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0103050P0%AF' OR --Omeprazole_Cap E/C 10mg (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0103050P0%AM' OR --Omeprazole_Tab Disper 10mg (E/C Pellets) (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0103050P0%AN' OR --Omeprazole_Tab Disper 20mg (E/C Pellets) (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0103050P0%AP' OR --Omeprazole_Tab Disper 40mg (E/C Pellets) (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0103050P0%BC' OR --Omeprazole_Tab E/C 10mg (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0103050P0%BD' OR --Omeprazole_Tab E/C 20mg (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0103050P0%BE' OR --Omeprazole_Tab E/C 40mg (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0103050R0%AA' OR --Pantoprazole_Tab E/C 40mg (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0103050R0%AB' OR --Pantoprazole_Tab E/C 20mg (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0103050T0%AA' OR --Rabeprazole Sod_Tab E/C 10mg (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0103050T0%AB'    --Rabeprazole Sod_Tab E/C 20mg (brands and generic)
